did.abstract: The farewell address Bancroft Gherardi, Rear Admiral and Commandant of the Brooklyn Navy Yard, upon his retirement from the United States Navy. The address is dated November 8, 1894. Bancroft Gherardi (1832-1903 was born in Louisiana. He entered the United States Naval Academy in 1852, was appointed Commandant of the Brooklyn Navy Yard in 1884.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Bancroft Gherardi (1832-1903 was born in Louisiana. He entered the United States Naval Academy in 1852, was appointed Commandant of the Brooklyn Navy Yard in 1884.
